'''Silky Queller of Sea Monsters''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Silky Queller of Sea Monsters is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] after solving a [[Dual-Phase Neverlight Cell]]/[[Dual-Phase Everlight Cell]] puzzle underground in [[Debris of Panjvahe]].
